subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade, who was injured Thursday night, was a game-time decision but scored 22 points with 12 rebounds and 10 assists in the Heat’s win over the Charlotte Bobcats.
snippet: Dwyane Wade, who was injured Thursday night, was a game-time decision but scored 22 points with 12 rebounds and 10 assists in the Heat’s win over the Charlotte Bobcats.
